markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hyena Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=2793) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 112 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Hyenas serve gnolls as pets, trackers, and in your case, vessels for spirits. You gain a Tiny hyena as a [familiar](/familiar-abilities).
name: Hyena Familiar
